markdownRemark.html:
Awesomeness! Google Chrome on Debian GNU/Linux can now print. This is the last major feature I was missing.

When I use PBooks to create invoices, I'd have to fire up Iceweasel just to print them. I still love Iceweasel, but its just not nearly as fast as Google Chrome / Chromium.

Major kudos to the Google Chrome / Chromium developers!!

frontmatter.title: Google Chrome on Debian GNU Linux can PRINT
